resources.string:
"GmsCore does not have permission to run in the background.
Follow the 'Don't kill my app!' guide for your device, and apply the instructions to your GmsCore installation.
This is required for the app to work."

"GmsCore battery optimizations must be disabled to prevent issues.
Disabling battery optimizations for GmsCore will not negatively affect battery usage.
Tap the continue button and allow optimization changes."
Type the hex code of the navigation bar color.
Disables Cairo splash animation when the app starts up.
Disables DRC (Dynamic Range Compression) applied to audio.
Tap and hold Song / Video toggle
Specifies how to redirect to official song.

"When a non-premium user plays a song included in an album, the music video is sometimes played instead of the official song.
Find the official song if a music video is detected playing from an album.
• Powered by Piped Instance API."
Includes the buffer in the debug log.
Displays the optimization dialog for GMSCore at each application startup.
"Hide elements of the settings menu. This hides not only the YT Music settings menu, but also the ReVanced Extended settings menu."
Data is provided by the SponsorBlock API. Tap here to learn more and see downloads for other platforms.

"Defines a default client for spoofing.
• When using the Android client, it is recommended to also use 'Spoof app version'."
Shows the client used to fetch streaming data in Stats for nerds.
